item.description:
We're meeting at our original Starbucks on 443 Boylston at Berkeley.

Who should come?
Rational sojourners! Anyone with an interest in Ayn Rand who would like to meet fellow admirers.

Why should people come?
To meet & drink beverages & socialize!

What will it be like?
Drink coffee, have fun, muse about anything from A is A to the moons about Mars.

Should members bring anything?
Yourselves!

What's a good ice-breaker question members can ask each other?
How have you recently used objectivist principles in your daily life? (We probably use them implicitly all the time, so maybe think of a time when you thought about objectivism explicitly in relation to an everyday problem.)

How will members find you when they get there?
I'll have dollar-sign bling bling.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Ayn Rand April Meetup
